title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Interpreting Route Description Documents Using Spatial Reasoning and Computation

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental mathematics concepts and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can accurately extract spatial movement information from route description documents.
Learners can simulate spatial reasoning processes using computer-assisted learning tools.
Learners can create educational materials using a GIS-based educational editor.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
